introduction:
Get contact details for Official Receivers in England and Wales. 

Official Receivers manage the first stages, at least, of an insolvency case. For example, they:

+ collect and protect assets for creditors after you've been made bankrupt
+ organise your discharge from bankruptcy
more_information: You can't get debt advice from an Official Receiver. For debt advice contact [Citizens Advice](http://www.adviceguide.org.uk/index/get_advice.htm "Find your local Citizens Advice Bureau"){:rel="external"} or the [National Debtline.](http://www.nationaldebtline.co.uk/ "National Debtline"){:rel="external"}
